SELECT id, writer_id AS writer, title, board_contents AS content, board_count AS count, created_at AS regdate FROM board WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (writer_id, title, board_contents, board_count, created_at) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{count}, NOW())
